All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BBQChicken
Represents a BBQ Chicken pizza with predefined toppings.
BuildYourOwn
Represents a Build-Your-Own pizza where customers can select their own toppings.
ChicagoController
Controller class for managing the UI interactions for Chicago-style pizza orders.
ChicagoPizza
Factory class for creating different types of Chicago-style pizzas.
Crust
Enum representing different types of pizza crusts.
CurrentOrderController
Controller class for managing the current pizza order interface.
Deluxe
Represents a Deluxe pizza with predefined toppings.
MainApp
 
Meatzza
Represents a Meatzza pizza with predefined meat toppings.
NewYorkController
Controller class for managing New York-style pizza orders in the UI.
NYPizza
Factory class for creating different types of New York-style pizzas.
Order
Represents a customer's order, containing a list of pizzas and providing functionality to add, remove, and calculate costs.
OrderHistory
Represents the history of orders placed by a customer or in the system.
OrderModel
Singleton class that manages the current order and the history of all orders.
OrdersPlacedController
Controller class for managing and displaying orders placed in the store.
Pizza
Abstract base class representing a Pizza.
PizzaFactory
Interface representing a factory for creating different types of pizzas.
pizzeriaController
Controller class for the main interface of the Pizzeria application.
Size
Enum representing different sizes for pizzas.
Topping
Enum representing different pizza toppings available in the application.
